project.description: This project used to publish openeuler website

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.1" PROJECT_NAME="openeuler-hk-website-v2" PROJECT_NAME_RU="openeuler-mos-website-ru"
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit fi
cd $WORKSPACE
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then WEBSITE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short=20 HEAD) echo "website_version=${WEBSITE_VERSION}" IMAGE_VERSION=${WEBSITE_VERSION}$(date +%s) echo "IMAGE_VERSION=${IMAGE_VERSION}" fi
source $WORKSPACE/script/docs-builder.sh
echo "building backend server" cd $WORKSPACE/server
sed -i "s|npm install|npm install --registry==https://registry.npm.taobao.org|" ./Dockerfile
docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend:$IMAGE_VERSION
echo "building frontend server" cd $WORKSPACE/web-ui
sed -i "s|npm install|npm install --registry==https://registry.npm.taobao.org|" ./Dockerfile
docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend:$IMAGE_VERSION
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then rm -rf "infra-openeuler" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/openeuler-website-v2 else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update image to $IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
# Build Website for Russian. cd $WORKSPACE source $WORKSPACE/script/builder-ru.sh
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then WEBSITE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short=20 HEAD) echo "website_version=${WEBSITE_VERSION}" IMAGE_VERSION=${WEBSITE_VERSION}$(date +%s) fi
echo "building backend server" cd $WORKSPACE/server
sed -i "s|npm install|npm install --registry==https://registry.npm.taobao.org|" ./Dockerfile docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend-ru:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend-ru:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend-ru:$IMAGE_VERSION
echo "building frontend server" cd $WORKSPACE/web-ui sed -i "s|npm install|npm install --registry==https://registry.npm.taobao.org|" ./Dockerfile
docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend-ru:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend-ru:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend-ru:$IMAGE_VERSION
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then rm -rf "infra-openeuler" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/openeuler-website-ru else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend-ru:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend-ru:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update image to $IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME_RU}/sync">/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
